amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: Sec. XX. None of the funds provided in this Act shall be available from the following Department of Defense military construction accounts for the following projects: ***.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in House Report 111-570 to prohibit funding for all of the member-requested earmarks for military construction projects.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Flake amendment was withdrawn.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Flake.
